# changedModelsArray

**Instance Property**

The array of registered models that have unsaved changes.

## Declaration

```swift
var changedModelsArray: [any PersistentModel] { get }
```

## Modifying models

- **hasChanges**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the context has unsaved changes.
